titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. E. H. Daniels and Reuben T. Daniels, Indictment
CWG7541

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Caldwell Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against } June Term 1865,,
E,, H,, Daniels,, Reuben T Daniels

The Grand Jury of Caldwell County, in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky: accuse E,, H,, Daniels. and Reuben,, T,, Daniels. of the offense of allowing minors to play on a Jennie Lind Table The said E,, H,, Daniels,, and Reuben T Dainels on the 10th day of January 1865. and on divers other days and times in the County aforesaid,, they being the owners and controllers of a gaming table called the Jennie Lind Table and used for gaming == purposes and on which money property and divers other things of value were bett won and lost on said table,, did willfully suffer and Clay Coon. Geo. Coon. E B Ford and Tish Overby minors under the age of twenty one years to engage at games and play on said Table= witnout the written consent of their parents or either of them,, against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Information given by = =,,

J. W. McCoy.
Foreman Grand Jury.
E. P. Campbell, attorny for the Commonwealth

E,, B,, Ford
Clay,, Coon,,
George,, Coon,,
Tish,, Overby
F,, W,,Dabney
W,, H,, Owen,,
William,, Denny,,

A Copy
attest J,, C,, Barnes,, clerk
By F,, W,, Dabney D C.

No 2
Comlth
vs } Indictment for permitting minors to game
Daniels & Daniels
A true bill
J W McCoy
foreman Grand Jury
Filed & noted in open Court June 13th 1865.
att F,, W,, Dabney. D C
issd
